body.description: The paper is beautiful and the envelopes are an extra nice touch. They are very distinctive and make writing to someone with this set seem like you really respect them and appreciate them. Package Included: 32 x writing paper 16 x envelopesA beautiful 20 cm*13 cm sticker Customer Service 7 days after the date of purchase, return your undamaged product and receive a full refund for ANY reason. 24 Hr dedicated email customer support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Writing Paper
reviews.reviewText: When I received this item, I wasn't expecting it to be divided up into two groups of each color, which contained matching envelopes along with the color of paper. I was very impressed with the way it was packaged as well as how quickly I received the item. (only 1 day)I have already used this product. The paper is thick, not thin and writing on it is very nice. The pages are very colorful and take the ink well. I would highly recommend this product to my friends and family. I will definitely purchase this product again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This paper and envelope set is so fun. I do wish each came with more envelopes but I just used others in my collection when I ran out. There is no adhesive so I used glue, turned out ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Entry Level Stationary
reviews.reviewText: Color is as pictured. Very cute gradient colors. Envelope is small. Paper quality is thin but ok. Everything is individually packaged so it felt like a lot of plastic waste. The only issue is that there is no glue on the envelope to lick and seal it. I had to use a separate glue stick to seal it shut for mailing. Overall it is a cute paper set, with cute bunny stickers, and a nice 'thank you' note from the seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful lined paper and envelopes
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful assortment of colored paper with lines and envelopes to match for writing letters

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I really like it but the letters are small. I bought these so it could be a fun way writing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: They look great visually. Didn’t realize they were so small and none of the envelopes have adhesive to seal them. They sent some really ugly “rabbit” stickers with them that I would never use to seal an envelope. I would not have bought these if I knew these two things. But I will keep them and use them, waiting on a set of flower stickers to come in to use to seal these envelopes 🤦🏻‍♀️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will Buy Again :)
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, clear straight lines, exactly as advertised and with pretty speedy shipping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful stationery just the right size.
reviews.reviewText: This stationery is just what I wanted. The colors are vibrant and the sheets are lined, which is a must for me, because without them, my writing goes uphill! Lol. Just the right size for penning a short letter. Even includes little stickers for the envelopes, letters, calendar ;-) whatever.
